PreceptDef.label: don't care
PreceptDef.description: We have bigger concerns to address than holes in our clothes, let's not waste our valuable time fretting or lamenting about such trivialities.

PreceptDef.label: disapproved
PreceptDef.description: Wearing ratty clothes is uncomfortable and should be avoided.

PreceptDef.label: abhorrent
PreceptDef.description: Ratty clothes are disgusting and should be discarded as soon as possible.

li.label: wearing ratty clothes
li.description: I'm wearing clothing that is tattered, and this is incredibly disgusting. Only the finest threads are worthy of my body.
